description: 探索 WeChatSDK.com，体验革命性的微信SDK和API。稳定不被封。提供视频号、朋友圈、直播间、群管理等底层API能力，为你打造创新的微信自动化程序。 by WeChatSDK.com ｜ 微信API
title: WeChat API: 免费试用 微信 API 能力| 稳定不封号 | 支持3.9.10 | WeChat-API | WeChat-SDK | 多开微信
introduction: WeChat SDK offers a comprehensive free trial with support for different versions, including 3.9.5 and 3.9.10. Personal users can enjoy a 7-day trial period, while business users have a 14-day trial period. Independent developers may apply for perpetual usage rights. The SDK provides WeChat API source code written in C++ technology, supporting various operations on the WeChat platform.
features: Dual-hook dual-protocol hybrid + active interference inspection mode
Over 150 APIs for WeChat platform operations
targetPeople: Personal users, business users, independent developers
pricing: Free trial for personal and business users, perpetual usage rights for independent developers

faqs.question: What is included in the free trial period for personal users?
faqs.answer: Personal users can enjoy a 7-day trial period.

faqs.question: How long is the trial period for business users?
faqs.answer: Business users have a 14-day trial period.

faqs.question: Can independent developers apply for perpetual usage rights?
faqs.answer: Yes, independent developers may apply for perpetual usage rights.
